title: Rarely Available 2 Bed Apt - Showing by appointment ONLY!
posting_body: Just 2 blocks from Indiana University Northwest.
Reply via e-mail to request an application and bring it with to the Appointment!
Beautiful and Gorgeous Apartment, Newly Rehabbed
- Totally Updated apartment with Many Upgrades
- Newer FURNACE and H/W HEATER, everything.. amazing stuff.
: A money order for one month security deposit  needed at time of lease.
We WILL find our tenant QUICKLY so do not miss the opportunity to rent this lovely apartment!!
Please email for an application and bring it to the appointment, or fax or e-mail it back to us (We prefer it be sent back prior to the appointment) .
Separate applications need to be completed for each person living in the home over the age of 18.
There is no application charge if you bring your security deposit with you, get approved, and sign a lease on the property
Owner will only perform a criminal background check of interested applicants once they bring security deposit.
There is no credit check to rent this home!
We look forward to meeting you.
Feel free to call or e-mail with questions or to request an application today!
